Question
========

In a sample of Dutch employees with burnout, stress levels are measured based on the number of nanograms of cortisol per milliliter in saliva. What is the measurement level of the measured variable?  

Answerlist
----------
* Dichotomous.
* Ordinal.
* Quantitative.
* Discrete.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
